sentence:
• The Home Depot Inc.'s HD shares decreased 1,6% after the company reported first-quarter revenues of $24,947 million lagging the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $25,202 million
• Agilent Technologies Inc. A plunged 9.7% after the company reported fiscal second-quarter revenues of $1.2 billion below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $1.3 billion
• Hollysys Automation Technologies Ltd.'s HOLI shares jumped 12.9% after the company reported fiscal third-quarter earnings of $0.36 beating the Zacks Consensus Estimate by a penny
• Shares of Symantec Corp. SYMC rose 4.4% after the company said an internal accounting probe would not likely result in any material impact on its past financial statement
